description: Offcourse is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. Based in Taipei, Taiwan, he's an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder who created the Superconnectors event format and founded the Innovator's Working Group of the Dutch Internet Society. With experience in traditional and non-traditional education, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. Offcourse focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work includes curating courses like "Scale Effectively," which emphasizes setting clear goals, breaking them into manageable tasks, and fostering team growth through shared learning.
blurb: To scale effectively, start by setting clear goals. Break these goals into manageable tasks. Share your learnings with your team to foster growth. Embrace complexity by focusing on small, impactful actions that compound over time.
